us.zoom.sdk

Class MeetingOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.zoom.sdk.MeetingOptions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InstantMeetingOptions, JoinMeetingOptions, StartMeetingOptions

    public class MeetingOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Options to enable/disable functions in meeting.
